attributes.action: persuade councils to provide bags/bins for dog walkers to collect/dispose of their dogs' faeces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In Prague, there are little posts with bags attached, for dog walkers to collect/dispose of dog faeces.

Why can't local councils here run a similar scheme, to try and make our pavements and parks a cleaner, safer place to walk?
